thread.title: Apple Watch officially starts ticking in UAE
thread.title_full: Apple Watch officially starts ticking in UAE

title: Apple Watch officially starts ticking in UAE
text:
Apple Watch officially starts ticking in UAE 
Gulf News Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Dubai: Apple has officially launched its watches in the UAE and Saudi Arabia through official channels on Thursday.The device, available in three variants -- Apple Watch Sport, Apple Watch and Apple Watch Edition -- started shipping globally on April 24, 2015.The watches were available in the grey market from April 25. It quickly became the second best-selling wearable device, according to research firm International Data Corporation (IDC), with shipments of 3.6 million as of second quarter this year and with a market share of 20 per cent. Fitbit shipped 4.4 million devices.More sales numbers ...
